Predictive Metrics

Source: vignettes/predictive-metrics.Rmd
predictive-metrics.Rmd
library(risk3r)

N <- 10000

predicted <- runif(N)

actual <- rbinom(N, size = 1, prob = predicted)

metrics(actual, predicted)
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>      ks   auc    iv  gini
#>   <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 0.496 0.831  1.75 0.661

Remove NA if are present.

predicted2 <- predicted
predicted2[sample(c(TRUE, FALSE), size = N, prob = c(1, 99), replace = TRUE)] <- NA

metrics(actual, predicted2)
#> 87 of 10000 'predicted' values are NAs, they will be ignorated
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>      ks   auc    iv  gini
#>   <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 0.495 0.824  1.72 0.648

Using a glm model 

daux <- data.frame(actual = actual, predicted = predicted)

m <- glm(actual ~ predicted, family = binomial, data = daux)

model_metrics(m)
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>      ks   auc    iv  gini
#>   <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 0.496 0.831  1.74 0.661

Works with new data.

new_daux <- head(daux, 1000)

model_metrics(m, newdata = new_daux)
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>      ks   auc    iv  gini
#>   <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 0.532 0.841  1.99 0.681
